memories.content: Waves 1-10 COMPLETE (2026-01-14, commit f8381ce). Backend APIs, Market/Reporting, React Query, 18 UI components, E2E testing (258 Playwright), Performance, Security (RBAC, token blacklist, eval() RCE fix), LazyImage, usePrefetch, React.memo, VirtualList. Tests: 337 frontend + 1055 backend.

conda env: /home/mattb/miniconda3/envs/dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. No agent swarms for sequential dependent tasks. Be extremely clear about what actions user needs to take; state clearly if no action needed. User prefers directness over hedging.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Shell env var SHAREPOINT_SITE_URL overrides .env with truncated value - MUST unset shell var before running extraction. DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data (dev: SQLite dashboard.db). Cell reference file: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx in project root. VITE_API_URL fix: src/lib/config.ts always appends /api/v1 to base URL; api.ts imports API_URL from config.ts as single source of truth.

EXTRACTION COMPLETE (2026-02-02): 28/28 files extracted, 0 failures, 52.8s total. 26 unique properties (2 files had empty property names). Avg success rate 67.1%, avg 771 real values per file. Extraction API: 18 endpoints. Filters: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15. 28 files pass (24 dead, 4 initial_review), 253 skipped. Scheduler: twice daily (cron 0 2,14 * * *), file monitor polls SharePoint every 30 min. Both in app/main.py lifespan.

ALL PAGES WIRED TO REAL DATA (2026-02-02): Phase 1: seed_database.py populates 35 properties, 20 deals, 66 transactions, 40 documents, 5 report templates, 6 queued reports, 4 distribution schedules, 2 users. Phase 2: Removed mock imports from TransactionsPage, DashboardMain, DocumentsPage, useDocuments, ReportTemplates, ReportQueue, Distribution, CustomReportBuilder, useMarketData, MarketPage, usePrefetch, usePrefetchDashboard, useGlobalSearch, TransactionsTab. All use API hooks (*WithMockFallback pattern). Phase 3: TypeScript clean, Vite build succeeds, all API endpoints verified. Remaining mock imports only in src/hooks/api/*.ts (fallback pattern), interest-rates page, and ReportSettings (config object).
